data.title: Contact Us
data.meta_description: Contact us if you are interested in advertising, need to submit a correction or get help with your subscription.
data.text:
Answers to many common questions can be found in our F.A.Q. farther below.

ADVERTISING

Advertising: For all advertising inquiries, including branded and sponsored content, please refer to our Advertise page and view our media kit.

SUBSCRIPTIONS, PERMISSIONS, and BACK ISSUES

Subscriptions: To subscribe to Newsweek, click here. For customer service, please contact support@newsweek.com.

Permissions and Licensing: For article reprints, bulk issues, permissions, and licensing requests, please contact licensing@newsweek.com.

Back Issues: To order a back-issue printed within the last 3 months, please visit: https://magdogs.com/newsweekbackissues. Please note that older issues are not available for resale.

SUBMISSIONS

Please note that all submissions become the property of Newsweek. We regret that, owing to the volume of submissions we receive, we are unable to respond unless a piece is being considered or accepted for publication.

Opinion: Newsweek's Opinion Desk is happy to consider op-ed pitches or full drafts of op-eds ranging from 600-1,000 words that make a strong argument on an issue relevant to our readers. Newsweek is looking for op-eds with a news peg that take a strong position on a larger debate Americans are having around the dinner table. Please send your submission to the Opinion Desk at opeds@newsweek.com.

My Turn: Newsweek's My Turn Desk publishes a range of distinctive first-person essays. If you have a unique and personal story to share, we would love to hear from you. Please send your submission to the My Turn Desk at myturn@newsweek.com.

What Should I Do?: Newsweek's What Should I Do? offers expert advice to readers. If you have a personal dilemma, please let us know via life@newsweek.com. We can ask experts for advice on relationships, family, friends, money and work and your story could be featured on WSID at Newsweek.

Pet of the Week: Do you have funny and adorable videos or pictures of your pet you want to share? Send them to life@newsweek.com with some details about your best friend and they could appear in our Pet of the Week lineup.

Personal Finance Submissions: Do you have a question or concern about your personal finance situation? Let us know via personalfinance@newsweek.com. We can ask experts for advice, and your story could be featured on Newsweek.

Other Submissions: We regret that we cannot consider additional categories of unsolicited stories.

RANKINGS

Rankings: For all questions related to Newsweek's rankings, including qualification and badging, please contact rankings.inquiries@newsweek.com.

PRESS & MEDIA

Press Inquiries and Media Relations: please visit Newsweek's Press Center for more information or contact media.inquiries@newsweek.com.

CAREERS

Aspiring Newsweekers: please visit Newsweek's Career Page for more information.

ADDITIONAL QUESTIONS & FEEDBACK

Additional Questions & Feedback: For all other matters, please contact support@newsweek.com. We will respond to your email as soon as possible and typically within 48 hours.

Questions can also be sent by mail to Newsweek, One World Trade, New York, NY 10007 or by phone at +1.646.867.7100.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

I forgot my password. How can I recover it?

If you are a current user and subscribed via newsweek.com, reset your password by selecting here. If your email address is not recognized, please email support@newsweek.com for assistance.

How do I make changes to my e-mail address or password?

If you are a current user and subscribed via newsweek.com, reset your password by selecting here. If your email address is not recognized, please email support@newsweek.com for assistance.

What if I cannot download new issues on an iPad or Kindle?

Please log out of the app and log back in using your credentials.

If you are a current user and subscribed via newsweek.com, reset your password by selecting here. If your email address is not recognized, please email support@newsweek.com for assistance.

If you subscribed via a third-party application, please contact your application provided (for example, iTunes support) for further assistance. Publishers do not have access to in-app subscriptions.

If I signed up through a third-party application, am I entitled to free access to Newsweek.com?

Unfortunately, no. Newsweek.com is the only place to sign up for full digital access. You can cancel your app subscription and sign up at Newsweek.com to get complete access to the website and our iPad, Kindle and Android apps.

How can I pay for my subscription?

Newsweek has numerous payment methods available which will renew automatically unless you decide to cancel.

When will I receive my first printed copy?

If you have subscribed to a print only or print and digital package, your first copy is usually delivered within 2 weeks of placing your order, however, we do ask that you allow up to 28 days, to allow for any local mail delays, before contacting customer support.

What happens if I decide to cancel my subscription?

Please email your request directly to support@newsweek.com confirming your registered email address.

Premium subscriptions to Newsweek are risk free, we will refund you for any unserved portion of your subscription unless you cancel within 4 weeks prior to your next renewal date.

If you cancel within 4 weeks prior to your next renewal date, we will serve your subscription until expiry and cancel your automatic renewal. Monthly Digital+ subscriptions are non-refundable, if you decide to cancel, we will cancel your automatic renewal for you.

How do I renew my subscription?

Newsweek operates an automatic renewal policy and as such, renewal reminders are not issued.

However, if you decide to cancel your automatic renewal and change your mind prior to expire, you can email us at support@newsweek.com to reverse this for you.

I have a question not listed hereâ€”how do I contact Newsweek?

For all other matters, please contact support@newsweek.com. We will respond to your email as soon as possible and typically within 48 hours. Questions can also be sent by mail to Front Desk, Newsweek, One World Trade, New York, NY 10007 or by phone at +1.646.867.7100.
